caption.p: Colony‚Äêforming unit concentrations of plated Aureobasidium melanogenum (isolate CBS 140241) suspensions with 1% raw linseed oil, 1% olive oil, and without a carbon source during shake flask cultivation (set A). MEA plates were used to grow the fungal colonies. Each data point represents the average of three suspensions. Error bars denote the SD. For some points, the error bars were shorter than the height of the symbol
